verses.text: Now there was \w long|strong="H0752"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* between the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*: but \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w waxed|strong="H1980"\w* \w stronger|strong="H2390"\w* and \w stronger|strong="H2390"\w*, and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w waxed|strong="H1980"\w* \w weaker|strong="H1800"\w* and \w weaker|strong="H1800"\w*.

¶ And unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w* were \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* in \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*: and his \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* was \w Amnon|strong="H0550"\w*, of \w Ahinoam|strong="H0293"\w* the \w Jezreelitess|strong="H3159"\w*;

And his \w second|strong="H4932"\w*, \w Chileab|strong="H3609"\w*, of \w Abigail|strong="H0026"\w* the \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of \w Nabal|strong="H5037"\w* the \w Carmelite|strong="H3761"\w*; and the \w third|strong="H7992"\w*, \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Maacah|strong="H4601"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Talmai|strong="H8526"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Geshur|strong="H1650"\w*;\f + \fr 3.3 \ft Chileab: or, Daniel\f*

And the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w*, \w Adonijah|strong="H0138"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Haggith|strong="H2294"\w*; and the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w*, \w Shephatiah|strong="H8203"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Abital|strong="H0037"\w*;

And the \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w*, \w Ithream|strong="H3507"\w*, by \w Eglah|strong="H5698"\w* \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*. These were \w born|strong="H3205"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w* in \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass, while there was \w war|strong="H4421"\w* between the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, that \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* made himself \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* for the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*.

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* had a \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w*, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Rizpah|strong="H7532"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Aiah|strong="H0345"\w*: and \add Ish-bosheth\add* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w*, Wherefore hast thou gone \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto my \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w*?

Then was \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w wroth|strong="H2734"\w* for the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Ish-bosheth|strong="H0378"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Am\add* I a \w dog’s|strong="H3611"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, which against \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* do \w shew|strong="H6213"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, to his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and to his \w friends|strong="H4828"\w*, and have not \w delivered|strong="H4672"\w* thee into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, that thou \w chargest|strong="H6485"\w* me to \w day|strong="H3117"\w* with a \w fault|strong="H5771"\w* concerning this \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*?

So \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* to \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w*, and more \w also|strong="H3254"\w*, except, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, even so I \w do|strong="H6213"\w* to him;

To \w translate|strong="H5674"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* from the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and to set \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and over \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, from \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* even to \w Beer-sheba|strong="H0884"\w*.
And he \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not \w answer|strong="H7725"\w* \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* a \w word|strong="H1697"\w* again, because he \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* him.

¶ And \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w* on his behalf, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Whose \add is\add* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*? \w saying|strong="H0559"\w* \add also\add*, \w Make|strong="H3772"\w* thy \w league|strong="H1285"\w* with me, and, behold, my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add shall be\add* with thee, to bring \w about|strong="H5437"\w* all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* unto thee.

¶ And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Well|strong="H2896"\w*; I will \w make|strong="H3772"\w* a \w league|strong="H1285"\w* with thee: but \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* I \w require|strong="H7592"\w* of thee, that \w is|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou shalt not \w see|strong="H7200"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, except thou \w first|strong="H6440"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w Michal|strong="H4324"\w* \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, when thou \w comest|strong="H0935"\w* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.\f + \fr 3.13 \ft that is: Heb. saying\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* to \w Ish-bosheth|strong="H0378"\w* \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \add me\add* my \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w Michal|strong="H4324"\w*, which I \w espoused|strong="H0781"\w* to me for an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w foreskins|strong="H6190"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.

And \w Ish-bosheth|strong="H0378"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* her from \add her\add* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, \add even\add* from \w Phaltiel|strong="H6409"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Laish|strong="H3889"\w*.\f + \fr 3.15 \ft Phaltiel: also called, Phalti\f*

And her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* with her along \w weeping|strong="H1980"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* her to \w Bahurim|strong="H0980"\w*. Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* unto him, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w return|strong="H7725"\w*. And he \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*.\f + \fr 3.16 \ft along…: Heb. going and weeping\f*

¶ And \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* had \w communication|strong="H1961"\w* with the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Ye \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* for \w David|strong="H1732"\w* in \w times|strong="H8543"\w* \w past|strong="H8032"\w* \add to be\add* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over you:\f + \fr 3.17 \ft in times…: Heb. both yesterday and the third day\f*

Now then \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add it:\add* for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w spoken|strong="H0559"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, By the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* I will \w save|strong="H3467"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of all their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.

And \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* also \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*: and \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* also to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* in \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w* all that \w seemed|strong="H5869"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* to \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and that seemed \w good|strong="H5869"\w* to the whole \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*.

So \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w* to \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* with him. And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* and the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that \add were\add* with him a \w feast|strong="H4960"\w*.

And \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, I will \w arise|strong="H6965"\w* and \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, and will \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* unto my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, that they may \w make|strong="H3772"\w* a \w league|strong="H1285"\w* with thee, and that thou mayest \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* over all that thine \w heart|strong="H5315"\w* \w desireth|strong="H0183"\w*. And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w*; and he \w went|strong="H3212"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

¶ And, behold, the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* from \add pursuing\add* a \w troop|strong="H1416"\w*, and brought \w in|strong="H0935"\w* a \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* with them: but \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* \add was\add* not with \w David|strong="H1732"\w* in \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*; for he had sent him \w away|strong="H7971"\w*, and he was \w gone|strong="H3212"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

When \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* and all the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* that \add was\add* with him were \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, they \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ner|strong="H5369"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and he hath sent him \w away|strong="H7971"\w*, and he is \w gone|strong="H3212"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

Then \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What hast thou \w done|strong="H6213"\w*? behold, \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee; why \add is\add* it \add that\add* thou hast sent him \w away|strong="H7971"\w*, and he is \w quite|strong="H1980"\w* \w gone|strong="H3212"\w*?

Thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ner|strong="H5369"\w*, that he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w deceive|strong="H6601"\w* thee, and to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* thy going \w out|strong="H4161"\w* and thy coming \w in|strong="H4126"\w*, and to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* all that thou \w doest|strong="H6213"\w*.

And when \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* was come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w*, which brought him \w again|strong="H7725"\w* from the \w well|strong="H0953"\w* of \w Sirah|strong="H5626"\w*: but \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \add it\add* not.

And when \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* was \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* took him \w aside|strong="H5186"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* with him \w quietly|strong="H7987"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him there under the \w fifth|strong="H2570"\w* \add rib\add*, that he \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, for the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of \w Asahel|strong="H6214"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*.\f + \fr 3.27 \ft quietly: or, peaceably\f*

¶ And \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* when \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add it\add*, he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I and my \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* \add are\add* \w guiltless|strong="H5355"\w* before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* from the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ner|strong="H5369"\w*:\f + \fr 3.28 \ft blood: Heb. bloods\f*

Let it \w rest|strong="H2342"\w* on the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, and on all his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; and let there not \w fail|strong="H3772"\w* from the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* one that hath an \w issue|strong="H2100"\w*, or that is a \w leper|strong="H6879"\w*, or that \w leaneth|strong="H2388"\w* on a \w staff|strong="H6418"\w*, or that \w falleth|strong="H5307"\w* on the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, or that \w lacketh|strong="H2638"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.\f + \fr 3.29 \ft fail: Heb. be cut off\f*

So \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* and \w Abishai|strong="H0052"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w*, because he had \w slain|strong="H4191"\w* their \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w Asahel|strong="H6214"\w* at \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w* in the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, and to all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* with him, \w Rend|strong="H7167"\w* your \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w gird|strong="H2296"\w* you with \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*, and \w mourn|strong="H5594"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w*. And \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \add himself\add* \w followed|strong="H1980"\w* the \w bier|strong="H4296"\w*.\f + \fr 3.31 \ft bier: Heb. bed\f*

And they \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* in \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*: and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* at the \w grave|strong="H6913"\w* of \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w*; and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w lamented|strong="H6969"\w* over \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Died|strong="H4191"\w* \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* as a \w fool|strong="H5036"\w* \w dieth|strong="H4194"\w*?

Thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \add were\add* not \w bound|strong="H0631"\w*, nor thy \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w put|strong="H5066"\w* into \w fetters|strong="H5178"\w*: as a man \w falleth|strong="H5307"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w wicked|strong="H5766"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*, \add so\add* \w fellest|strong="H5307"\w* thou. And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w* over him.\f + \fr 3.34 \ft wicked…: Heb. children of iniquity\f*

And when \w all|strong="H3605"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w cause|strong="H1262"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* to \w eat|strong="H1262"\w* \w meat|strong="H3899"\w* while it was \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, So \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* to me, and more \w also|strong="H3254"\w*, if I \w taste|strong="H2938"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, or \w ought|strong="H3972"\w* else, \w till|strong="H6440"\w* the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* be \w down|strong="H0935"\w*.

And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* took \w notice|strong="H5234"\w* \add of it\add*, and it \w pleased|strong="H3190"\w* them: as whatsoever the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w pleased|strong="H5869"\w* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.\f + \fr 3.36 \ft pleased them: Heb. was good in their eyes\f*

For all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w understood|strong="H3045"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that it was not of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* to \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ner|strong="H5369"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w Know|strong="H3045"\w* ye not that there is a \w prince|strong="H8269"\w* and a great \w man|strong="H1419"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

And I \add am\add* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w weak|strong="H7390"\w*, though \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*; and these \w men|strong="H0582"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w* \add be\add* too \w hard|strong="H7186"\w* for me: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w reward|strong="H7999"\w* the doer of \w evil|strong="H6213"\w* according to his \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*.\f + \fr 3.39 \ft weak: Heb. tender\f*
